original_text: I pray this for the tribes of Zebulun and Issachar: Be happy, Zebulun's people, as you travel far from home. Be happy, Issachar's people, as you live in your homes. I pray this for the tribes of Zebulun and Issachar:
korean_text: 스불론에 대하여는 일렀으되 스불론이여 너는 밖으로 나감을 기뻐하라 잇사갈이여 너는 장막에 있음을 즐거워하라

sentences.original_text: I pray this for the tribes of Zebulun and Issachar:
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 스불론 지파와 잇사갈 지파를 위해 이렇게 기도합니다:

sentences.original_text: as you travel far from home.
as you live in your homes.
